channel.title: Need some help with this script please
channel.description: I've been fiddling with Renagades Ultimate Fisher, in the fishing guild. It seems to (mostly) run the way it's supposed to, assuming I did what I was supposed to. I am new to scar scripting, so most of this is greek to me. I set my client to low detail and v-bright, and I am running on 32bit color. I also set the dock color, grass color next to dock, and bank floor color on minimap. The problem I am having is when the script goes to bank fishies, it clicks right above or to the left of the bank, outside of it. I am trying to get it to click inside the bank rather than run all the way around behind it. I tried to post the script in code tags, but too many characters, so here is a link to the same script. [url=http://www.icpnet.pl/~pest/Pest/scarScripts/UltimateFisher.scar]http://www.icpnet.pl/~pest/Pest/scarScripts/UltimateFisher.scar[/url] If someone can help me get this fixed i'll pay some RS2 gold, don't wanna be a leecher XD

item.title: Need some help with this script please
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“darkxion, post:1, topic:5136”]I’ve been fiddling with Renagades Ultimate Fisher, in the fishing guild. It seems to (mostly) run the way it’s supposed to, assuming I did what I was supposed to. I am new to scar scripting, so most of this is greek to me. I set my client to low detail and v-bright, and I am running on 32bit color. I also set the dock color, grass color next to dock, and bank floor color on minimap. The problem I am having is when the script goes to bank fishies, it clicks right above or to the left of the bank, outside of it. I am trying to get it to click inside the bank rather than run all the way around behind it. I tried to post the script in code tags, but too many characters, so here is a link to the same script. http://www.icpnet.pl/~pest/Pest/scarScripts/UltimateFisher.scar
If someone can help me get this fixed i’ll pay some RS2 gold, don’t wanna be a leecher XD[/quote]

Well, if you knew how to code in scar then you might be able to fix it. E-mail Marcbauvil@aol.com with the EXACT thing you have and i’ll take a look.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with this script please
